languages.text: ...отправил{mf||а} рекрутов на баррикады в тоннелях улья, лично казня каждого, проявившего страх или сомнение. Полк понес колоссальные потери, однако первым ворвался в осажденный город.

...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.
languages.original_text: ...отправил{mf||а} рекрутов на баррикады в тоннелях улья, лично казня каждого, проявившего страх или сомнение. Полк понес колоссальные потери, однако первым ворвался в осажденный город.

traits.locale_text: ...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

languages.text: ……派遣新兵攻打巢都隧道的街垒，并亲手处决那些畏缩不前或怀疑命令的人。这支军团遭受了惨重的损失，但它是第一支冲入城市的军团。
languages.original_text: ...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

traits.locale_text: ……派遣新兵攻打巢都隧道的街垒，并亲手处决那些畏缩不前或怀疑命令的人。这支军团遭受了惨重的损失，但它是第一支冲入城市的军团。

languages.text: ... envió reclutas a las barricadas de los túneles de la colmena y ejecutó personalmente a cualquiera que mostrara miedo o dudas. Aunque el regimiento sufrió bajas cuantiosas, fue el primero en entrar a la ciudad asediada.
languages.original_text: ...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

traits.locale_text: ... envió reclutas a las barricadas de los túneles de la colmena y ejecutó personalmente a cualquiera que mostrara miedo o dudas. Aunque el regimiento sufrió bajas cuantiosas, fue el primero en entrar a la ciudad asediada.

languages.text: …新兵をハイヴトンネル内のバリケードに派遣し、恐怖や疑念を示した者を個人的に処刑した。連隊は多大な損害を被ったが、包囲された都市に最初に侵入した
languages.original_text: ...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

traits.locale_text: …新兵をハイヴトンネル内のバリケードに派遣し、恐怖や疑念を示した者を個人的に処刑した。連隊は多大な損害を被ったが、包囲された都市に最初に侵入した

languages.text: ...schickte Rekruten auf die Barrikaden in den Tunneln des Bienenstocks und ließ jeden, der Angst oder Zweifel zeigte, persönlich hinrichten. Das Regiment erlitt große Verluste, aber es war das erste, das in die belagerte Stadt eindrang.
languages.original_text: ...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

traits.locale_text: ...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

languages.text: ... a envoyé des recrues à l'assaut des barricades dans les tunnels de la ruche, exécutant personnellement tous ceux qui manifestaient de l'hésitation ou de la peur. Le régiment a subi des pertes colossales, mais il a été le premier à pénétrer dans la ville assiégée.
languages.original_text: ...dispatched recruits to the barricades in the hive tunnels, personally executing anyone who displayed fear or doubt. The regiment suffered massive losses, but it was the first to penetrate the besieged city.

traits.locale_text: ... a envoyé des recrues à l'assaut des barricades dans les tunnels de la ruche, exécutant personnellement tous ceux qui manifestaient de l'hésitation ou de la peur. Le régiment a subi des pertes colossales, mais il a été le premier à pénétrer dans la ville assiégée.
